info.author: DataShop@CMU datashop-help@lists.andrew.cmu.edu
info.abstract: The MOOCdb component helps make data in a current MOOCdb become available for longitudinal features extraction.

ul.li: A MOOCdb file (see description above). This can be done using a file Import component.
MOOCdbPointer.txt: contains the name of the new MOOCdb created.
MOOCdbFeatures.txt: contains names of all available longitudinal features. This is used by the succeeding feature extraction component.
